import React from 'react'; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import 'react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css'; import PageTitle from '../components/pagetitle'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' Register.propTypes = { }; function Register(props) { return (

Register To Rockie

Register in advance and enjoy the event benefits

Email
Mobile

Already have an account?

Login

Already have an account?

Login
); } export default Register;
